title: Buttoshi
author: Buttoshi
created_time: July 02, 2022, 12:09:24 PMLast edit: July 07, 2022, 12:17:42 PM by Buttoshi
content: Greetings,For sale: turnkey meme token solution at Binance Smart Chain network. Butt Token - https://buttoken.clubOf course, escrow is at your expense.I was forced to make this decision by circumstances in Ukraine, where my artist disappeared and another person lost interest in developing this idea for the same reason.Butt Token was minted by DxSale (IDO listing will contain the Verified badge)Butt Token has been audited by Audit Rate Tech (you can get the corresponding badge on PinkSale).It's up to you to choose where to put it on sale.The entire token and related services are sold as is:- Domain name (I can provide an account details at NameSilo or transfer domain name to you)- Website with licensed theme and plugins (Wordpress)- Keys to Metamask wallets.- I can help you install this website on your webhosting.- All rights to use Buttoshi Buttomoto as your avatar Â Binance Smart Chain address:https://bscscan.com/token/0xbB26981C7FF24d3FC5646AECe53D6d041E87E27DSome of the tokens have been burned, some are still in a locked state:https://dxsale.app/app/v3/dxlockview?id=0&add=0xf68dF85A84eeC385b1f0dC079b3B6b94A26FE3af&type=tokenlock&chain=BSChttps://dxsale.app/app/v3/dxlockview?id=0&add=0xF1e66c8c93a2454f482654D0b75858f6a2A877d9&type=tokenlock&chain=BSCPrice: 350 USD (audit costs min.500, Bitcoin or BSC network are fine) and you can start business immediately.Escrow is accepted!Feel free to Telegram me: https://t.me/vicmyak

comments.author: Buttoshi
comments.body: I would like to apologize, the website wasn't working and no one even told me about it.

comments.author: Buttoshi
comments.body: I lowered the price, it's final, if it will not sell, then I'll give it to one of my friends, let them work...Have a nice day.Buttoshi Buttamoto
